content.en: Kidney disease prediction: Researchers are exploring the use of algorithms, specifically deep learning and machine learning approaches, to predict and diagnose kidney diseases using ultrasound images. These algorithms are being developed to determine kidney function, classify different stages of chronic kidney disease, and detect abnormalities in the kidneys. By integrating computer-extracted features and using convolutional neural networks, these algorithms aim to improve the accuracy and efficiency of diagnosing kidney diseases through image processing.
content.da: Nyre sygdom forudsigelse: Forskere udforsker brugen af algoritmer, specifikt dyb læring og maskinlæring tilgange, til at forudsige og diagnosticere nyresygdomme ved hjælp af ultralydsbilleder. Disse algoritmer bliver udviklet til at bestemme nyrefunktion, klassificere forskellige stadier af kronisk nyresygdom og opdage abnormiteter i nyrerne. Ved at integrere computer-udtrukne træk og bruge konvolutionelle neurale netværk, sigter disse algoritmer mod at forbedre nøjagtigheden og effektiviteten af at diagnosticere nyresygdomme gennem billedbehandling.
